events.name: Antalya Psychology Camp
events.description:
🔻Alfakamp Psychology Camps have been bringing hundreds of people together in different cities with different speakers in summer and winter formats for 5 years, offering an amazing experience by simultaneously providing holiday, education, and entertainment!

🗓️ April 25-26-27-28, 2024
📌 Vonresort Golden Beach Hotel Side Antalya (5-Star Resort)
🍽️ Ultra All-Inclusive Concept

🎉 DJ Performance 90’s Party / Poolside Pool Parties
📗 Training Sessions That Create Awareness with Gökhan Çınar, Mehmet Şakiroğlu, and a Team of Expert Instructors in Their Field

⭐Our camp, taking place at the 5-Star Vonresort Golden Beach Hotel from April 25-28, will indulge you for 3 nights and 4 days with conferences by expert instructors leading to awareness and knowledge, 5-Star hotel comfort with pool, sea, spa, and the ultra all-inclusive format offering unlimited food and beverage, welcoming summer in a beachfront resort, and will satisfy you with entertainment through a DJ performance with a 90’s party and award-winning games

🔸Pricing and Payment Information:
▪️ Credit Card Payment in 9 Installments Option
▪️ 5% Discount for Direct Bank Transfer (EFT) Payments
▪️ Prices vary for February, March, and April.

events.name: 15th Psychology Days: Colorful Psychology
events.eventHost: Istanbul Okan University Department of Psychology
events.description:
Everything speaks in its own language;

Even if darkness covers it

It continues in the night, in various colors

On the tree branch, in the wind;

Everything speaks in its own color.

Can Yücel, Green Poem

We are organizing this event for undergraduate psychology students and newly graduated psychology enthusiasts. Our aim is to bring together young individuals at the beginning of their journey with those who have dedicated years to various disciplines of psychology. Thus, we want to connect young psychologists or candidates who are seeking their own path with different role models and create an active interaction environment where emotions, thoughts, and experiences are shared...

Where did the idea of 'Colorful Psychology' come from? Let's explain by quoting from the text I wrote while introducing the Psychology Department on Okan University's Psychology Department website: Imagine for a moment that you want to paint a wall in your house. Needless to say, before obtaining your color, you need to make some preparations to color the wall. First, you must repair and prime the wall. Then, with the right information, you mentally prepare the color, quality, and suitability of the actual coloring you will apply in multiple layers. Undergraduate education in psychology is like this initial stage to achieve the desired outcome and establish a solid foundation. Your color choice occurs as a final step that reflects your desire and goal. Let's continue with our coloring analogy. There are so many colors to choose from that each one can open the doors to a different world for you...

We couldn't cover all the colors in this first meeting. There are many more colors to come. Let's get started. We are waiting for all students. See you soon..

Prof. Dr. Arif Haldun SOYGÜR

events.name: A Movie, A Psychologist
events.eventHost: Turkish Psychologists Association Ankara Student Unit
events.description:
Greetings from the Student Representatives Commission of the Turkish Psychologists Association Ankara Branch, wishing everyone healthy and happy days.🎈

The movie ticket is on you, the popcorn is on us! 🍿

In our event named “One Movie One Psychologist,” we will watch the movie Manchester by the Sea with our Media Psychologist & Therapist Gözde Aytulun Şen. Afterwards, we will have the chance to analyze this movie in depth with our instructor. As the film starts at 12:00, we recommend arriving no later than 11:30 to get drinks and popcorn. 🎥

🗓 27th of April, Saturday

🕰 12:00

📍Fade Stage&Coffee (Cinnah Street, Farabi Street No: 39/A, 06690 Çankaya/Ankara)

❗️Our event is only open to psychology students.

❗️Our event fee is 50 TL, and please note that you cannot fill out the form without uploading your receipt. Payments are non-refundable.

❕Please don’t forget to include your Name-Surname-University name when sending your payment.

❕Our capacity is limited. Therefore, in order to avoid unfairness to other applicants, we kindly ask you to inform us at least one day in advance at “ogrenci@psikolog.org.tr” if you cannot attend.

events.name: 5th METU Neuroscience Days

events.description:
Hello everyone! 🧠

events.name: 7th Türkiye Psychotherapy Summit
events.description:
🎉7th Year at the Summit🎉

We are thrilled to share with you the 7th Turkey Psychotherapy Summit 🥳

This year's theme: Family and Couples Therapy

For 7 years, we've been bringing together the leading figures in psychotherapy and striving to provide you with the latest information on psychotherapy approaches.

On April 27-28, we will endeavor to present a unique psychotherapy summit with the theme of Family and Couples Therapy.

events.name: Neuropsychological Tests Training
events.description:
🖥️ The training will be conducted via an Online Training Platform.

✔️ Participants will receive a Training Certificate approved by Moodist Academy.

❓Who Can Attend the Training?
-Graduates and senior students (3rd and 4th year) of Psychology, Psychological Counseling and Guidance, Child Development and Education, and similar departments are eligible to attend.

🎯Objective of the Training
-To provide general information about neuropsychology, neuropsychological assessment, neuropsychological tests; to transfer what these tests measure, their validity, and to impart skills in administering, scoring, and interpreting these tests.

🖇️ Tests are not included in the training fee.

events.name: 35 Basic Techniques Used in Psychotherapy
events.description:
Within the scope of the program, regardless of the school they practice, participants will be provided with 35 fundamental techniques from various approaches, essential for their toolkit. These techniques are designed to facilitate swift change in clients, especially when encountering challenges during psychotherapy sessions.

The objective of the program is to impart practical skills in applying a wide array of fundamental techniques functional in therapy and derived from many different schools. Throughout the program, participants will be introduced to the theoretical underpinnings of effective and functional techniques from evidence-based therapeutic schools.

Following this theoretical presentation, participants will be given detailed instructions on how to apply these techniques through case studies, and will have the opportunity to practice these techniques through role-plays. This approach ensures that participants complete the program with both a theoretical understanding and practical experience in applying these key techniques.

events.description:

events.name: VI. National Psychology Graduate Students Congress
events.eventHost: Ankara Yıldırım Beyazıt University Department of Psychology & TPD
events.description:
Hello from Aybü Psychology! 🤗

We are delighted to invite you to the VI. National Psychology Postgraduate Students Congress with the theme 'Disrupted Routines, Changing Questions, New Approaches,' hosted by the Turkish Psychologists Association at Ankara Yıldırım Beyazıt University's Department of Psychology from June 7th to 9th, 2024. ✨

On behalf of the Turkish Psychologists Association (TPD) and the VI. National Psychology Postgraduate Students Congress (UPLOK 2024) Organizing Committee, we are pleased to announce the Congress Co-Chairs: 👥 Prof. Dr. Aslı Göncü-Köse and Dr. Instructor Emine İnan.

Congress Website: 🖥️ www.aybu.edu.tr/uplok.

Congress Venue: 📌 Ankara Yıldırım Beyazıt University National Will Campus, Gaza Street No:7, Etlik-Keçiören/ANKARA.

Congress Schedule: 🗓️ Abstract submission deadline: May 1, 2024. Congress program publication date: May 31, 2024.
